column1: I want my self esteem to be worse than it already is
Do your worst, it's not that hard
Shred me to pieces like a good cheddar.
Roast my fat flab. Just yo erryday eagles fan
Dropped out of a band to become a music teacher, he thinks you cant roast him harder than himaelf, do your worst.
My names Ashley and My hip is broken I want every last oz of self esteem I have left completely obliterated
